mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, m_no, bip) VALUES (#{btitle }, #{bcontent }, (SELECT m_no FROM members WHERE m_id=#{m_id}), #{bip })
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE bno=#{bno } AND m_no=(SELECT m_no FROM members WHERE m_id=#{m_id})
